verbose_text: It was also found that lipopolysaccharide (LPS) can induce the expression of nuclear factor (NF)-kappaB and CX3CL1 in human bronchial epithelial cells, and it was found that aspirin improved the pathological changes in rats with APE via the CX3CL1 / CX3CR1 signaling pathway.
evidence: expression of nuclear factor (NF)-kappaB and CX3CL1
